definition: "silk" radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 120), occurring in 红, 绿, 累 etc/also pr. [mi4]

sentences.english: Thee longer the explanation, the bigger the lie.
sentences.chinese: 缱解释的越长，谎言就越大。

sentences.english: One day when you ' re married, you ' ll wish you were single.
sentences.chinese: 缱等有一天结婚了，你会希望你还是单身的。

sentences.english: Strangely my heart is drawn to the side of this plum tree.
sentences.chinese: 偶然间心似缱，在六合彩太阳图库梅树边。

sentences.english: She probably just lost your number.
sentences.chinese: 缱她可能只是把你的号码弄丢了。

sentences.english: She met me in the Fleet Street and greeted me with a sweet smile.
sentences.chinese: 她在舰队街上遇见我缱，并对我致以甜甜的一笑。

sentences.english: You ' re just too busy right now.
He ' s just not ready for a serious commitment yet.
sentences.chinese: 缱他只是还没准备好对你做出认真承诺而已。

sentences.english: Don ' t worry, you ' ll find someone someday.
sentences.chinese: 缱不要担心，你总有一天会找到对的那个人的。

definition: fine black hair/dried plum (sliced, as cake ingredient)
see 徘徊[pai2 huai2], to dither/to hesitate/to pace back and forth/irresolute
to manner of dancing/to walk around
tip of the eyebrows/top margin on a page
